name: Four Picture One Word Puzzle
description:
Hello Friends!

This is amazing trivia word puzzle game for all ages. There are so many different levels. You just need to give correct answer. Hints also help to pass levels.

How To Play?
==========
- See four picture and guess the word and give it's correct answer.
- Completed levels and earn coins.

Features:
=======
- So many different and unique puzzle.
- It's amazing game for also education.
- Easy to play.
- Watch video and earn free coins.
- There are two different hints help to solve your puzzle.
- HD Stunning graphics.
- Supported IOS 11.

So are you ready for test your brain? Download Now...

Don't forget review us!
